statements: SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, contact_number FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_number FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, contact_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id > 5 ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'ABC%' AND contact_number LIKE '%123';
SELECT supplier_id, contact_person, supplier_name FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id BETWEEN 3 AND 8 ORDER BY supplier_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_phone FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM purchase_orders WHERE order_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(order_id) AS order_count FROM suppliers JOIN purchase_orders ON suppliers.supplier_id = purchase_orders.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM purchase_orders WHERE order_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_amount DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_phone, order_date FROM suppliers JOIN purchase_orders ON suppliers.supplier_id = purchase_orders.supplier_id;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT supplier_id, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM purchase_orders GROUP BY supplier_id HAVING total_orders > 5 ORDER BY total_orders DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email, supplier_phone FROM suppliers;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products;
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, product_price FROM suppliers JOIN products ON suppliers.supplier_id = products.supplier_id;
SELECT supplier_name, order_quantity, order_date FROM suppliers JOIN products ON suppliers.supplier_id = products.supplier_id JOIN purchase_orders ON products.product_id = purchase_orders.product_id;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM suppliers;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email, supplier_phone FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_price, supplier_name FROM products INNER JOIN suppliers ON products.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id;
SELECT order_id, order_quantity, order_date FROM purchase_orders WHERE order_quantity > 10 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM products WHERE supplier_id = 1
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY order_date ASC
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 2
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM products WHERE product_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND product_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT orders.order_id, orders.quantity, products.product_name FROM orders JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id WHERE orders.quantity > 10 ORDER BY orders.order_date DESC;

SELECT suppliers.supplier_name, SUM(inventory.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM suppliers JOIN products ON suppliers.supplier_id = products.supplier_id JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id GROUP BY suppliers.supplier_name HAVING total_quantity > 50 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50;
SELECT order_id, quantity, order_date FROM purchase_orders WHERE quantity < 100 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT supplier_id, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM purchase_orders GROUP BY supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 100 ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id;
